ygData.subject: Re: The Tyrants of the West Commonlands
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Ford Prefect  To:  ... Alas, ars you have mentioned the Freeport Millita is not the noble orgination
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Ford Prefect <migraine@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>From: "Ford Prefect" <migraine@...>
>
>Fellow Historians of Norrath, Well met!
>
>i have a most unusual tale to tell today of my adventures in the
>commonlands..
>.......................................................................

Alas, ars you have mentioned the Freeport Millita is not the noble
orgination that they seek to be preceived as. As my travles have lead me to
descover, the members of the Freeport millita are seeking their own
agendias, amoung them is the complete and unjust controll of the city. I was
shocked to discuber this from Kala at the Temple of Truth and others.

It seems that the leader of the Millita is seaking control of the city
though anymeans possable, and they are not to be trusted. As I find out more
on Kala's quest, I will kep you appraised.

SnowLynx, Gentalmen Bard of Freeport...
